title: Golden Chances
description: Alternate Cover Edition for ASIN: B00DTMO4S0A new addition to the Homespun romance series. His heart once broken by a woman, wealthy rancher Reese Jordan wants only to hire a wife to bear an heir to his family fortune. Faith Collins needs money to keep her Southern homestead. Theirs is a marriage of convenience--until the warmth of family teaches them the true meaning of love.
author: Rebecca Hagan Lee
